name: 古碧源
objective:
導航衛星系統發展歷史，現有三大系統：美國 GPS、俄羅斯 GLONASS、歐盟 Galileo 介紹，GPS 定位原理，GPS 座標系統，GPS 系統結構與衛星，差分定位，GPS 訊號結構，GPS 精確度增強系統，GPS 接收器與接收演練，GPS 應用範例。
Navigation Satellite system history, Introduction to GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo systems, GPS positioning principle, GPS datum, GPS system structure and satellite constellation, Differential positioning, GPS signal structure, GPS augmentation systems, GPS receiver and demonstration, GPS applications.
